text: khanditavagiyu (allahanige) saranada purusaru mattu saranada striyaru, visvasi purusaru mattu visvasi striyaru, vidheya purusaru mattu vidheya striyaru, satyavanta purusaru mattu satyavanta striyaru, sahanasila purusaru mattu sahanasila striyaru, bhaya bhakti ulla purusaru mattu bhaya bhakti ulla striyaru, danasila purusaru mattu danasila striyaru, upavasi purusaru mattu upavasi striyaru, tam'ma manavannu sanraksisuva purusaru mattu antaha striyaru mattu pade pade allahanannu smarisuttiruva purusaru mattu antaha striyaru â€“ avarigagi allahanu ksameyannu hagu bhavya pratiphalavannu sid'dha padisiruvanu
